programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le concours de danse / Une pieuvre farceuse) S8 (21/24)
programme.desc: «Le concours de danse / Une pieuvre farceuse»A dance contest being judged by Luke Stars goes wrong when a floating dancefloor carries the contestants away. // The pups investigate a mystery at an undersea-themed museum exhibit and discover an octopus that wants to return to the ocean.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le parc au trésor / À pas de géant) S2 (n°215)
programme.desc: «Le parc au trésor / À pas de géant»When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting! // Rammy is so focused on meditation that he fails to focus on a REAL crisis!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (The Big Bug Hunt) S2 (n°12)
programme.desc: «The Big Bug Hunt»Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve la Limande / La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve un narval) S4 (22/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve la Limande / La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve un narval»Cap'n Turbot's boat gets frozen in the Arctic Ice. // The pups use the Sea Patroller to help guide a lost narwhal back home.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat'Patrouille des mers : Le volcan sous-marin / La Pat'Patrouille des mers : Inondation à la ferme) S5 (6/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat'Patrouille des mers : Le volcan sous-marin / La Pat'Patrouille des mers : Inondation à la ferme»Francois and Turbot discover an underwater volcano is going to erupt while Farmer Yumi and Mayor Goodway are unknowingly scuba diving nearby. This is a mission for the Sea Patrol! // Farmer Al's farm is flooded! The PAW Patrol needs to rescue him.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve mamie Tilly / Un éléphant en colère) S5 (13/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve mamie Tilly / Un éléphant en colère»The Paw Patrol must rescue Cap'n Turbot and Francois' Grandma Tilly after she rides off on a Dolphin. // Carlos and Tracker calls the Paw Patrol to help solve the mystery of a rumbling sound that's upsetting the Jungle elephants.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Water Walker / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Windsurfer) S8 (6/24)
programme.desc: «Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Water Walker / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Windsurfer»Mayor Humdinger swipes Francois' water-walking shoes and ends up trapped in a pit-like turtle nest. // A long lost letter inspires Ms. Marjorie to visit an old surfing buddy. The pups spring into action when a nearby volcano erupts.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Sea Patrol 3 - Pups Save a Shark) S4 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Sea Patrol 3 - Pups Save a Shark»In hopes to have the whole beach to himself - Humdinger makes a robotic shark to scare everyone away.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle) S9 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle»When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Kiko's Song) S2 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Kiko's Song»When the coquís of Isla Encanto stop singing, Santi and crew travel into the rainforest to find out the mystery behind their silence.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Coach Grandma) S1 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Coach Grandma»Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La mare aux petits bateaux) S2 (12/52)
programme.desc: «La mare aux petits bateaux»Peppa and George learn that throwing waste away is fun, especially if you can divide it into special bins so that the waste can be reused. So recycle!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Monsieur l'épouvantail) S2 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Monsieur l'épouvantail»Peppa and George go to the beach with Grandpa and Grandma Pig and find tide pools there. Peppa doesn't like it at first, but when she discovers what can be experienced with and in such pools and she even rescues a fish, she wants one too.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Pancakes) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Pancakes»Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Blue Butterfly) S1 (n°73)
programme.desc: «The Blue Butterfly»Anna and her friends are on a mission to capture a photograph of a pretty flower, but on the search, they see a beautiful blue butterfly. The friends finally discover the best way to capture their enchanting photo.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (L'anniversaire surprise d'Astrid / La Pat' Patrouille sauve une tour de pizzas) S5 (26/26)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire surprise d'Astrid / La Pat' Patrouille sauve une tour de pizzas»Ace's birthday and the puppies are building a nice birthday present for her. Mayor Humdinger wants the present himself. Adventure Bay wants to break the world record for highest pizza makers. But of course Mayor Humdinger wants that too.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue's Treasure of the Clue Lagoon) S3 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Blue's Treasure of the Clue Lagoon»Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington joue au ping-pong) S2 (4/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington joue au ping-pong»Paddington & Mateo form a table tennis team and the beat the table hogs so everyone can play!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Paw Patrol: Jet to the Rescue)
programme.desc: «Paw Patrol: Jet to the Rescue»The Duke of Flappington takes the Princess' gem and uses its magical powers to raise Barkingburg into the sky! Skye will need to overcome her biggest fears and lead the team in their biggest aerial rescue yet! Get ready to JET TO THE RESCUE!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Une pluie de peluches / Le bal masqué) S2 (n°204)
programme.desc: «Une pluie de peluches / Le bal masqué»Jade's first sleepover is an eventful occasion when Stu & Safia make it rain teddies across the city and Central Forest! // Sir Steel is put out when he discovers he's not been invited to Lady Fluffpot's party but the Deer Squad are.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog) S2 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog»It's Mrs. Bird Day & Paddington wants to make a cake with a Special jar of Marmalade but no one can open it - how will he show his appreciation?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Hotel Paddington) S2 (24/27)
programme.desc: «Hotel Paddington»Paddington opens Windsor Gardens' first ever pet hotel when he has Lucky to stay over.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Pancakes) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Pancakes»Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Water Walker / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Windsurfer) S8 (6/24)
programme.desc: «Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Water Walker / Sea Patrol: Pups Save a Windsurfer»Mayor Humdinger swipes Francois' water-walking shoes and ends up trapped in a pit-like turtle nest. // A long lost letter inspires Ms. Marjorie to visit an old surfing buddy. The pups spring into action when a nearby volcano erupts.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat'Patrouille des Mers et Sid Laratisse) S5 (9/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat'Patrouille des Mers et Sid Laratisse»The ferris wheel has been stolen by Sid the Pirate and Arrby. The pups set out to bring it back to Adventure Bay! However, Sid comes up with an even more sneaky plan: to steal the Sea Patroller!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve Pat'lantis) S4 (26/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve Pat'lantis»Sid Swashbuckle the Pirate and his first pup mate Arrby steal the giant pearl-making shell that gives Puplantis its magic.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve l'épave d'un bateau / La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve une baleine) S5 (3/26)
programme.desc: «La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve l'épave d'un bateau / La Pat' Patrouille des mers sauve une baleine»Sid the Pirate and his First Mate Arrby have taken the sunken sloop! A wiggling whale has knocked the diving bell upside down.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Pier) S4 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Pier»The pier could fall into the water due to a broken support post.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle) S9 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle»When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le recyclage) S2 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le recyclage»There is nothing more fun than sailing a boat .. isn't it? Peppa is a little dissatisfied with her boat at first, but then she discovers that sailing with paper boats is the most fun!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le bureau de papa Pig) S2 (22/52)
programme.desc: «Le bureau de papa Pig»Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig's office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit's job is all about numbers, Mrs Cat's job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pig's job is... complicated. Peppa and George have a go at each job. They love working at Daddy's office.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'île aux pirates) S2 (23/52)
programme.desc: «L'île aux pirates»Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and her friends on a boat trip to pirate island to dig for treasure. Ahhhh ... while they are building a sand castle Grandpa fell asleep on the boat and drifted away ... What now?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La vente de charité) S2 (19/52)
programme.desc: «La vente de charité»Peppa and George want to go to the playground with Papa and Mama Pig. But a fog sets in and they get lost. When Papa Pig thinks they are back home, the fog clears and they are... in the playground!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le moulin à paroles) S3 (44/52)
programme.desc: «Le moulin à paroles»Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camion de Monsieur Fox) S3 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Le camion de Monsieur Fox»When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van - even a chicken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les amis de Chloé) S3 (46/52)
programme.desc: «Les amis de Chloé»Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Grass is Always Greener...) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «The Grass is Always Greener...»Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie»By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Mission faucon) S3 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Mission faucon»Blaze visits the Animal Island with AJ and Gabby. The Super Air Race is held there. Blaze and his friends want to join in too but only Blaze can't fly.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le Malfaiteur Mystérieux) S1 (12/20)
programme.desc: «Le Malfaiteur Mystérieux»After a win at the Dome, Blaze meets one of his biggest fans: Ferris. Moments later, the steel trophy won by Blaze and AJ suddenly disappeared. However, the mysterious bandit turns out to be Ferris.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La forteresse en carton / L'île de Bill le grand pélican) S8 (17/24)
programme.desc: «La forteresse en carton / L'île de Bill le grand pélican»When Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island, the misguided explorer gets carried away by a really, really big bird.

programme.desc: «Paddington's Radio Show / Paddington's Butler»Mr. Curry's & Paddington's favorite radio show is cancelled - how will they ever know the ending now? // Mr. Curry ends up being Paddington's butler for the day - but he's better giving orders than taking them.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Coule ou flotte) S1 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Coule ou flotte»The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Pancakes) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Pancakes»Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (L'anniversaire surprise d'Astrid / La Pat' Patrouille sauve une tour de pizzas) S5 (26/26)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire surprise d'Astrid / La Pat' Patrouille sauve une tour de pizzas»Ace's birthday and the puppies are building a nice birthday present for her. Mayor Humdinger wants the present himself. Adventure Bay wants to break the world record for highest pizza makers. But of course Mayor Humdinger wants that too.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington joue au ping-pong) S2 (4/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington joue au ping-pong»Paddington & Mateo form a table tennis team and the beat the table hogs so everyone can play!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Jour de sport) S2 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Jour de sport»Peppa and George are allowed to go to Daddy Pig's office for a day. They like all the work done in the office equally.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le garage de Papy Dog) S2 (17/52)
programme.desc: «Le garage de Papy Dog»It is amazing what Grandpa Dog provides everyone within his garage. And fortunately, otherwise you have bad luck with your bad luck as a breakdown! But when something goes wrong with the new car wash, Papa Pig suddenly turns out to be the great savior.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage en montgolfière) S2 (25/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage en montgolfière»Peppa and her family are at the school fête. The top prize in the raffle is a trip in a Hot Air Balloon. Peppa wins! Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb into the balloon. Everyone enjoys the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Funny Photo) S1 (n°77)
programme.desc: «The Funny Photo»While flipping through her Funny Photo Album, Froga is surprised to learn she has no funny picture of Anna! Setting off to remedy this, Froga instills the assistance of her friends to try to score a hilarious photo of Anna.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Gift Box) S1 (n°78)
programme.desc: «The Gift Box»The friends are having a gift exchange and Bubu ends up with a present from Christopher. When he mistakes the box itself for the actual gift, Christopher is convinced Bubu doesn't like his present.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Même pas cap ! / Roy) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Même pas cap ! / Roy»On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Les Rythmes de Blue) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Les Rythmes de Blue»Josh starts a band and uses Blue's Clues to find out which instrument Blue wants to play.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups vs. Ouchy Paws / Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party) S8 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Pups vs. Ouchy Paws / Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party»Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard. // Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Traduitout / Le Concours de fleurs) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «Le Traduitout / Le Concours de fleurs»Sir Steel unwittingly took over Bobbi's role to communicate with baby animals, with the help of his animal translator. // In his quest to win the Platinum City Flower Show, Sir Steel created super seeds that grow into gigantic mazes.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La perruque du pouvoir / Le canard qui trompétait au loup) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «La perruque du pouvoir / Le canard qui trompétait au loup»Steel Tower is under new management not once but twice - can the Deer Squad return it to a distraught Sir Steel? // Steel and Lady Fluffpot are putting up a play. Ian's false alarms frustrate Kai, but one of them turns out to be a REAL emergency!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Panddington and the Treehouse / Paddington and the Monster Hunt»Mr. Brown is worried he won't get sleep since the kids will be scared camping in the treehouse. Paddington wants to prove him wrong but there is a lightning storm. // There's a monster in Paddington's room and Mrs. Bird takes him on a monster hunt.

programme.title: Mini Chef (S'Mores) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «S'Mores»Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Coach Mamie Shark / Programme chargé) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Coach Mamie Shark / Programme chargé»Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Snowball Bonanza) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Snowball Bonanza»Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Detectives) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «The Detectives»Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Super Christopher) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Super Christopher»Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fruits Surprise) S1 (n°70)
programme.desc: «Fruits Surprise»When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Present for Ron) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «A Present for Ron»Christopher loves Ron's rock collection so much, he wants to add another beautiful rock to it! They set off on a journey to find the most amazing rock they can find. When they discover it - they must figure out a creative solution to get it to Ron!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Trip to the Moon) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «The Trip to the Moon»Christopher dreams to visit the moon so his friends make his wish come true. Bubu makes a rocket ship in cardboard and the friends make Christopher an outfit with everything he will need during the trip to the moon.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Spider) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «The Spider»Anna and Froga are completely freaked out when they learn a spider lives in Ron's treehouse with him! Ron tries his best to convince his friends that the spider is harmless.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Zoé Zébra, la fille du facteur) S2 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Zoé Zébra, la fille du facteur»Mr. Zebra the Postman is delivering the post and today his daughter Zoë is helping him. Zoë has a very special letter for Peppa and George; an invitation to her birthday party. Mummy Pig helps Peppa and George write a reply. They post their reply in the post box and then Peppa and George help Mr. Zebra deliver it all the way to Zoë's house. The birthday party is fantastic fun, especially as it turns out that Zoë has invited all of Peppa and George's.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La peinture) S2 (28/52)
programme.desc: «La peinture»Mr. Zebra the Postman is delivering the post and today his daughter Zoë is helping him. Zoë has a very special letter for Peppa and George; an invitation to her birthday party. Mummy Pig helps Peppa and George write a reply. They post their reply in the post box and then Peppa and George help Mr. Zebra deliver it all the way to Zoë's house. The birthday party is fantastic fun, especially as it turns out that Zoë has invited all of Peppa and George's.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La pendule à coucou) S2 (30/52)
programme.desc: «La pendule à coucou»The old cuckoo clock in Peppa and George's bedroom hasn't worked for sometime. So, Daddy Pig winds it up. The clock strikes the hour and a wooden cuckoo pops out, flapping its wings and singing "Cuckoo!!" Peppa thinks it is very funny, but George was looking the wrong way and has missed the whole thing. George does not want to miss the cuckoo again but the cuckoo only pops out once an hour...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (The Cycle Ride) S2 (33/52)
programme.desc: «The Cycle Ride»Peppa and her family are going for a day's cycle ride. Peppa loves cycling downhill but she's not so keen on peddling uphill. So, when the family meet all of Peppa's friends and decide to have a race, Peppa insists it should be a down hill race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le cours de gymnastique) S3 (47/52)
programme.desc: «Le cours de gymnastique»Peppa and her friends go to help at Edmond Elephant's birthday party, but the little children are harder to look after than they expected.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le mûrier) S3 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le mûrier»Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 (n°23)
programme.desc: Mrs Zebra teaches Peppa, George, Zoe, Zaza and Zuzu Zebra how to make a real tea set from clay.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Little Monsters) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «The Little Monsters»The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...»Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Fast Friends) S3 (16/20)
programme.desc: «Fast Friends»Blaze, AJ, and Gabby meet a brand new monster machine named Watts - a super fast truck with electric tires! But when one of her special tires goes rolling into the jungle, Blaze, AJ, and Gabby promise to help her get it back.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Zeg et l'oeuf) S1 (13/20)
programme.desc: «Zeg et l'oeuf»While playing Begg, Zegg's favorite game, the Monster Wheels find the egg of a Truckadactylus. The Monster Wheels do everything they can to return the egg to the nest as soon as possible.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Mr. Hellinger le Baby-Sitter / L'inauguration de la serre) S8 (22/24)
programme.desc: «Mr. Hellinger le Baby-Sitter / L'inauguration de la serre»Mayor Humdinger babysits his new friend's children, but trouble arises when they start feuding with his kitties. // When Mayor Goodway and Mayor Humdinger gets accidentally locked in a greenhouse and need rescued from an exotic plant inside.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le cygne gonflable / Le lav'animaux) S8 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Le cygne gonflable / Le lav'animaux»The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable. // Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La roue de Métal / Le bongo de Bobbi) S2 (16/20)
programme.desc: «La roue de Métal / Le bongo de Bobbi»When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting!
